participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, enjoys meeting new people and trying new things.
participant_1.background: I live in North Dakota. I work as a waitress. I ride a bike. I have 5 brothers and sisters.

participant_2.name: Diego
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys programming and has a passion for culture and socializing.
participant_2.background: I had one stepdad, and fortunately, he ignored me. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it's Italian. I wear cardigans because I hope it makes me look more cultured. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice.

content.text: Hi, I'm from North Dakota. I work as a waitress and I ride a bike. I have 5 brothers and sisters.

Hi, I'm from Spain. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people it's Italian. I wear cardigans because I hope it makes me look more cultured. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. I don't know if I enjoy programming or if it's my only choice.
It's nice to meet you! I've never been to Spain, but I've always wanted to go. What's it like there?
It's beautiful! The weather is great, the food is amazing, and the people are friendly.
That sounds amazing! I'll definitely have to visit someday.
You should!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, play soccer, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go to the beach too. I'm not much of a soccer player, but I enjoy watching it.
That's cool! I'm glad we have something in common.
Yeah, me too!
So, what are you doing in North Dakota?
I'm here for work. I'm a waitress at a local restaurant.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a waitress.
It's not as easy as it looks, but it's a lot of fun.
I can imagine.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I don't know much about programming, but I've always thought it was interesting.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging.
I can imagine.
So, what are you doing tonight?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out with friends, or I might just stay in and watch a movie.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I'm going to a party tonight.
Oh, that sounds fun! I wish I was going.
You should come!
I don't know. I don't know anyone there.
You don't have to know anyone. It's a party! Everyone is welcome.
I don't know. I'm not sure if I'm dressed right.
You don't have to be dressed up. A t-shirt and jeans are fine.
I don't know. I'm not sure if I'm going to fit in.
You'll fit in just fine. Everyone will be friendly.
I don't know. I'm just not sure about it.
Come on! It'll be fun!
Okay, fine. I'll go.
Great! I'll pick you up at 8.
Okay.
See you then!
